item.title: Fosun Confirms Application for Hong Kong Stablecoin License, Guo Guangchang Leads Team to Meet with Hong Kong Chief Executive
item.description: On August 12th, as per Tencent News, Fosun has verified its application for a stablecoin license in Hong Kong and has assembled a complete team for the stablecoin license application. On August 6th, Guo Guangchang, the founder of Fosun, personally led the core stablecoin team within Fosun and other senior executives to meet with Carrie Lam, the Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, and Paul Chan, the Financial Secretary of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, respectively.Through its subsidiary Fosun Wealth, Fosun has already achieved progress in the digital asset field via the Starpath Technology platform. This includes participating in the distribution of a money market fund tokenization product launched by Huaxia Fund and developing a Real World Asset (RWA) tokenization platform.According to the timeline of the Hong Kong Monetary Authority, institutions planning to apply can get in touch with the regulatory authority after August 1st and are req

item.title: The Smarter Web Company has increased its BTC holdings by 295 coins, bringing its total holdings to 2395 coins.
item.description: On August 12th, according to official information, the publicly listed company The Smarter Web Company in the UK announced that it had increased its stake in 295 bitcoins, with an average price of approximately $119,412. As a result, its total holdings reached 2395 coins.

item.title: DigitalOcean Announces Pricing of $550 Million of Convertible Senior Notes Offering
item.description: On August 12th, as per businesswire, DigitalOcean Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: DOCN) announced today that it has set the price for $550 million in the aggregate principal amount of 0% interest, 2030 convertible senior notes. The private offering is aimed at those reasonably believed to be qualified institutional buyers. The sale of the notes to the initial purchaser is expected to be settled on August 14, 2025, subject to the usual closing conditions.Furthermore, DigitalOcean has granted the initial purchaser a purchase option, enabling them to purchase up to an additional $75 million in the aggregate principal amount of notes within 13 days starting from the original issue date of the notes.

item.title: Binance Announces World3 (WAI) Airdrop Claim Threshold: Initially Requires 200 Alpha Points
item.description: August 12th. According to official information, Binance Alpha is set to launch World3 (WAI) on its platform, and Alpha trading will commence on August 12th, 2025, at 16:00 (UTC+8). After the trading starts, users who hold at least 200 Binance Alpha Points can claim 800 WAI tokens through an airdrop. The first come, first served principle applies. If the event is not yet completed, the points threshold will automatically decrease by 15 points every hour. Claiming the airdrop will consume 15 Binance Alpha Points. Users must confirm the claim on the Alpha event page within 24 hours; otherwise, it will be regarded as giving up the airdrop.

item.title: El Salvador has been buying 1 BTC every day for 1000 consecutive days
item.description: August 12th. The Bitcoin Historian pointed out that El Salvador has been adhering to a daily "buy-the-dip" strategy for 1000 consecutive days and purchasing 1 Bitcoin each day. On-chain data indicates that the Salvadoran government currently holds a total of 6266.18 BTC, approximately $743.3 million.

item.title: Meme Coin SEND Hit by Developer Rug Pull, Plunges Over 87% in 1 Hour
item.description: On August 12th, according to GMGN market data from GMGN, the Meme token SEND on bonk.fun experienced a developer rug pull. Its market capitalization dropped from a peak of $6.95 million to $500,000, resulting in a 87.81% price decline within 1 hour.

item.title: Moonbirds' Market Cap Enters Top Ten in Ethereum Ecosystem NFT Rankings
item.description: On August 12th, based on CoinGecko data, the market capitalization of the Moonbirds series NFT has exceeded that of Milady Maker and ranked 10th on the Ethereum ecosystem NFT leaderboard.According to Magic Eden market data, the current floor price of Moonbirds is 2.855 ETH, with a 24-hour price change of 24.7%.

item.title: "Big Brother Whale" Huang Lizheng's Long Position on Chain Surpassed $30 Million in Unrealized Gains
item.description: On August 12th, according to the monitoring of LookOnChain, the on-chain staking rewards of "Big Brother Whale" Huang Licheng have shown a rebound. Currently, they exceed 30 million US dollars. He is optimistic and holds significant amounts of ETH, HYPE, and PUMP long positions.

item.title: AguilaTrades once again liquidates the ETH short position at a stop loss, marking the third consecutive "top-sniping short" with a loss of $3.8 million.
item.description: August 12th. According to Ember Monitor, the whale trader AguilaTrades has consecutively liquidated his short position for the third time. He closed the majority of his ETH short position that he opened earlier this morning, 20 minutes ago. The remaining part is also being gradually liquidated through TWAP.During the past three days, AguilaTrades has carried out three "top-sniping" actions on ETH. Each time, he set a stop-loss after the price rose by $50 above his short entry price, resulting in a loss of $3.8 million.

item.title: Li Xiaolai once said "Revisit EOS in 7 Years"; On its seventh anniversary, Bullish Goes to NYSE for IPO and Receives Oversubscription
item.description: On August 12th, the prominent blockchain investor Li Xiaolai once expressed his anticipation for the future of the EOS ecosystem in a WeChat Moments post titled "Looking at EOS Seven Years Later" on August 10th, 2018.Block.one (the blockchain company behind EOS), whose digital asset exchange platform Bullish was launched in 2020, is expected to be officially listed on the NYSE on August 13th, 2025.This time, the Bullish IPO still received oversubscription after expanding the issuance scale, indicating the high recognition of Block.one and its ecosystem in the market.Note: EOS has been renamed to Vaulta (A).
